seniority_level.evidence: 3 years minimum experience required, no 'Senior' in title, but responsibilities indicate experienced practitioner level beyond entry

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' with core focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, and visualization

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, visualization using Cognos, and data warehouse patterns

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or direct reports; focus on individual contribution in analysis, development, and maintenance

primary_cloud.evidence: Cloud platforms (AWS, Google, Azure) mentioned only as nice-to-have skills, no clear primary cloud provider indicated

secondary_clouds.evidence: No specific cloud provider established as primary, so no secondary clouds to list

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL/Data Integration tools and BI/DW projects suggests batch processing for reporting and analytics rather than real-time streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: ETL tools mentioned (DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica) but no specific orchestration platform clearly indicated

storage_layer.evidence: Emphasis on BI/DW (Data Warehouse) projects and reporting suggests data warehouse as primary storage layer

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite work model specified with location restriction to Pune, Maharashtra, India

timezone_focus.evidence: Role based in Pune, Maharashtra, India with no mention of other regions or global teams

relocation_required.evidence: Role requires being in Pune, Maharashtra, India - no relocation needed as candidate must already be located there

h1b_friendly.evidence: India-based onsite role, H1B visa sponsorship not applicable or mentioned

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: India-based role, US student visa programs (OPT/CPT) not applicable for this position

citizenship_required.evidence: Standard work authorization requirement for India-based position, no specific citizenship restrictions mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent employment type indicates W2 employee status rather than contractor arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No discussion of career paths, growth opportunities, or advancement potential in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or learning opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities, advancement, or career progression

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required qualifications (Cognos, 3 years experience, Master's) and preferred skills (cloud platforms, ETL tools)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description centered on Business Intelligence data engineering with well-defined responsibilities in reporting and visualization

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience requirement and skill set (Cognos, BI/DW, reporting) are reasonable and appropriate for mid-level BI data engineer role
